wixui-rich-text__text (2): At Papillon Yachts, we pride ourselves on offering a versatile fleet that caters to every type of gathering, from romantic getaways for two to unforgettable large-scale celebrations on the water. Every yacht charter is designed to be as unique as your vision, giving you the freedom to craft an experience that reflects your style and needs.
wixui-rich-text__text (3): Tell us your ideas, and our expert team will transform them into reality, creating a bespoke experience you and your guests will cherish forever. Our friendly and professional concierge team is always on hand to guide you through the booking process and provide prompt answers to any questions, ensuring a seamless and stress-free journey from start to finish.

wixui-rich-text__text (2): Our professional and experienced staff will ensure that your yacht rental experience in Cabo San Lucas is unique and memorable, thats why we take the extra mile to ensure the complete satisfaction of our guests.
wixui-rich-text__text (3): We offer a wide variety of boats to choose from, ranging from small and intimate to large and spacious.
wixui-rich-text__text (4): All our boats are fully equipped with modern amenities such as high quality sound systems, full open bar, food and snacks, top-of-the-line safety equipment for snorkeling, a large floating mat and paddle boards.
wixui-rich-text__text (5): Don't miss out on the opportunity to explore the beautiful waters of Cabo in style. Book your yacht rental today and improve your vacations in Los Cabos.

wixui-rich-text__text: To make your experience seamless, we offer with no extra cost Â luxury round-trip transportation in our deluxe vans. From the moment you leave your hotel until you return, you'll enjoy the comfort and convenience of our premium service.

wixui-rich-text__text (2): Each boat has a standard occupancy of guests. Additional passengers have an 'extra guest fee', with the price depending on the boat, each boat also has a maximum

color_11 (4): All vessels come with life jackets, emergency equipment, and first aid kits. If you have known allergies or medical requirements, please bring the required medication in the event of an emergency and let us know when booking to avoid those ingredients in the menu.
color_36: We understand that plans can change. To ensure a smooth experience for all our guests, please review our cancellation and rescheduling terms:
color_36 (2): 48 Hours Before Your Cruise: If you cancel or reschedule at least 48 hours before your scheduled cruise, you will receive a full refund of your deposit or payment.
